exercise.title: This is the title: Exercise 1
exercise.sentence:
Our company provides a _____ range of services.
wide long tall

This technology is not
up to hour. up-to-date. up to now.

We need new products to _____ in the market.
compete competitor competitive

I need the goods now, but this company can't deliver them for five weeks.
Their delivery time is too low. Their delivery time is too slow. Their delivery time is too high.

I love this hotel because the staff are really
up-to-date. competitive. friendly.

These are budget flights so they give people a
low option. bad option. cheap option.

We only produce very _____ quality goods.
expensive high big

I'm not happy with our suppliers. They provide a very slow
service. quality. range.

The office is in a very expensive
location. technology. quality.

The sales teams need to provide a _____ service to customers.
more good best better

We have a faster delivery time _____ our competitors.
than of as

Olga is _____ than Joe.
more experience experienced more experienced

The weather in this country is _____ than in England.
bad more bad worse

The staff in Philadelphia are _____ than the staff in my team.
friendly friendlier more friendlier

Which company is
more expensive? many expensive? much expensive?

Japanese is _____ to learn than English.
more difficult difficult the difficult

I'd like a _____ loan from the bank.
more big biggest bigger

Tell me about the two broadband companies. How do they
compare? compared? comparison?

The quality of the goods from China and Vietnam is
same. similar. similarity.

What is the difference between the paper from Finland and Estonia?
There isn't no difference. There's not difference. There's no difference.

What do you think of the FMO TVs and the SQ TVs?
I'll prefer the SQ TVs. I'm preferring the SQ TVs. I prefer the SQ TVs.

I think the SQ TVs are really good.
OK, we choose them. OK, let's choose them. OK, let's chose them.

Why do you think it's a good idea to open an office in Singapore?
The advantage is that there are lots of high quality employees there. The disadvantage is that there are lots of high quality employees there. The advantages is that there are lots of high quality employees there.

We make aeroplanes,
but we make also cars. also but we make cars. but we also make cars.

Do you like the French plan or the German plan?
This one better. This is better one. This one's better.
